title: Ready Made
content:
Ready Made: A font I'm doing for a school project..   
Please let me know what you think. All comments are much appreciated.   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020202932im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/27047.gif)
author: synch

comments.content:
Updated with the caps and the rest of the undercase..   
Lightened the thickness also.   
   
Is it worth making a real font out of it? I'm still in illustrator at the moment..   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020202932im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/27559.gif)

Heavy Metal Lite with a bit of DeStill influence. Very Interesting. Comparing UC G to UC K, they don't seems to be from same alphabet. perhaps a bit more synchronization is needed.   
A progressive music magazine would surely buy this once it is completed.
